name: Timothy Pickard
text: Ordered a large sub and cookie. Got a large sub with the cheese not melted. Didn't get my cookie but got someone else's pizza. Would have been great if I ate onions and bell peppers. I see every bad review just responds with "we need to do better". No response needed here. Pizza hut it is.

name: Scott Pulver
text: Came in from our of town and were excited to see a Hungry Howie's here. Pizza was cooked perfectly and tasted amazing. 3 cheese bread was also fantastic. Appreciate the hard work and dedication to excellence! We'll definitely be back!

text: Food has always been fantastic.  If ever anything is incorrect he has always fixed it.  The Salads are always fresh and good.  I love the calzones and the pizza.  Never dissapointed.  I highly recommend Hungry Howies for great food.
